item.title: Hello Python & R
item.description: Today we will be learning the reticulate packedge in R and how to use Python in the same R Markdown file! library(reticulate) Variable Assignment #This is a R Code Chunk R_Var <- "Hello I was made in R" Here is a variable assignment in R #This is a Python Code Chunk Py_Var = "Heyo I was made in Python" Here is variable assignment in Python Acessing Different Variables #Python Code Chunk print(r.
